title: Rehab : Incentive built up area shall be 1 : R Where R = [ 2
clause_text: Rehab : Incentive built up area shall be 1 : R Where R = [ 2.8 - ( n x 0.3 ) ] Where Y = Rate of Residential Flat per Sq.m. and X = Rate of Construction per Sq.m.
